item.title: HOOD
item.description: score:128 Chances: Retail engagement materially accelerated in the first quarter, which could lead to increased trading activity on the Robinhood platform According to eMarketer, credit cards will remain the most popular payment method for US consumers through next year, which could benefit Robinhood’s cash management and debit card services Risks: The latest trading session showed a -1.
